contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary}} '''Jehovist''' may refer to one of the following: *(Normally [[Jahwist]]): One of the four sources making up the [[Pentateuch]] (Jewish [[Torah]]) according to the [[documentary hypothesis]]. *[[Yehowists]], a Russian 19th century sect<ref>[http://caliber.ucpress.net/doi/abs/10.1525/nr.2006.9.3.080 Sergey V. Petrovâ€Œ, The Jehovists-Il'inites A Russian Millenarian Movement]</ref> *An adherent of [[Yahwism (disambiguation)|Yahwism]] (also called a Yahwist) *A term used for [[Jehovah's Witnesses]] in the [[Soviet Union]] (derogatory connotation). ==References== {{Reflist}} {{disambig}}
